===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[love]]; [[affection]]
#* {{zh-x|祖國 愛|patriotism}}
# [[love]]; [[benevolence]]
#* {{zh-x|遺愛人間|to leave '''love''' behind}}
# to [[love]]
#* {{zh-x|我 愛 你。|I '''love''' you.}}
#* {{zh-x|你 愛 他 嗎？|Do you '''love''' him?}}
# [[affectionate]]
#* {{zh-x|愛情|love}}
# [[beloved]]
#* {{zh-x|愛妻|'''beloved''' wife}}
# to [[like]]; to be [[fond]] of; to be [[keen on]]

#* {{zh-x|我 不 愛 吃 豬肉。|I don't '''like''' to eat pork.}}
# to be [[prone]]; to be [[easy]] to
#* {{zh-x|愛 發脾氣|to be [[short-tempered]]}}
#* {{zh-x|鐵 愛 生鏽。|Iron rusts '''easily'''.}}
# to [[treasure]]; to [[value]]
# {{lb|zh|Hakka|Cantonese|Wu}} to [[want]] (an object) {{attention|zh|also Min Nan (Teochew?)}}
#* {{zh-x|我 唔 愛 咁多。|I don't '''want''' that much.|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Min|Hakka}} to [[want]] to do; to [[need]] to; [[must]]

# something one loves; someone whom one loves
#* {{zh-x|割愛|to sacrifice '''something one loves''' to someone else}}
# {{n-g|Honorific for someone else's daughter; variant of {{zh-l|嬡}}.}}
#* {{zh-x|令愛|your '''precious daughter'''}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

====Synonyms====
{{zh-dial|喜歡}}

====Usage notes====
* When used for people, {{lang|zh|愛}}／{{lang|zh|爱}} usually refers to romantic love. When used like this, older Mandarin speakers often describe the use of this term as overly {{zh-l|肉麻|something that gives you the creeps, disgusting}}. For this reason, the word {{zh-l|喜歡|to like}} might be used instead. Using the word {{zh-l|喜歡}} literally means ''like'', but when used in a romantic context (especially boyfriend/girlfriend), it actually means love. However, younger Mandarin speakers seem to have been influenced somewhat by Western culture, and are now using the verb {{lang|zh|愛}}／{{lang|zh|爱}} much more often than was socially acceptable in the past.
